addonId.description: The ID for the addon, matches the name field in the addon manifest and the folder name for the submission.
addonId.title: The ID for the addon

addonVersionNumber.title: The addon version number
addonVersionNumber.description: Pure numerical representation of the version being released.

addonVersionName.title: The addon version name
addonVersionName.description: The addon version being released. Must match the version in the addon manifest and the file name for the submission.

displayName.description: The name that will be displayed in English for the addon.
displayName.title: The display name (en) of the addon

publisher.description: The name of the individual, group, or company responsible for the addon.
publisher.title: The publisher name for the addon

description.description: The English description of the addon that will be displayed for the addon.
description.title: The description (en) of the addon

homepage.description: If the addon has a homepage where users can get more information about the addon, you can specify it here.
homepage.title: The homepage URL for the addon.

minNVDAVersion.title: The minNVDAVersion schema
minNVDAVersion.description: The addon will not work with versions of NVDA prior to this version.

lastTestedVersion.title: The lastTestedVersion schema
lastTestedVersion.description: The add-on has been tested up to and including this version of NVDA

channel.description: Used to define pre-release (beta) add-ons. Should be either 'stable', 'beta' or 'dev'
channel.title: The channel for the addon

URL.description: To allow directly downloading the *.nvda-addon file. The URL should remain valid indefinetly. GitHub release URL's are recommended.
URL.title: The URL to download the add-on.

sha256.description: Use the python script '_tools/genSha256.py' to generate this value.
sha256.title: The sha256 for the *.nvda-addon file.

sourceURL.description: Allows reviewers to inspect the source code for common issues.
sourceURL.title: The URL for the add-on source

license.description: The short name of the license.
license.title: The short name of the license for the addon

licenseURL.description: A URL to the full license for the addon.
licenseURL.title: The URL of the license

legacy.description: Legacy add-ons have invalid data or manifest. Legacy add-ons are not listed in the NVDA add-on store.
legacy.title: Mark add-on as legacy

translations.description: A collections of translations generated from localized add-on manifests
translations.title: Translations

major.title: The 'major' part of the version number.

minor.title: The 'minor' part of the version number.

patch.title: The 'patch' part of the version number.

displayName.description: The translated name that will be displayed for the addon.
displayName.title: Translated display name

description.description: Translated description that will be displayed for the addon.
description.title: The translated description
